nodes.text: The Chagrasi Remnant was a region in the Grumani sector which had formerly been under the control of the Sith Lord Chagras, as part of the Chagras Hegemony.

Following the death of Chagras in 1040 BBY, most of the systems that Chagras had ruled fell to the control of other Sith Lords. However, some of the systems held out from the invaders and came to be known as the Chagrasi Remnant. As of 1032 BBY, the Jedi Master Vannar Treece was uncertain as to whether the term "Chagrasi Remnant" referred to an actual Sith power, or just a region that the warring Sith Lords had not conquered.
